founded.note: Guidehouse was founded in 2018 when Veritas Capital acquired PwC's U.S. Public Sector business

headquarters.note: Originally McLean, VA; moved to Tysons, VA in 2021

offices.note: Firm has 55+ locations globally; listed major U.S. cities based on firm website references

regions.note: Confirmed presence in Americas, Europe, Asia (India, South Korea), and Middle East (UAE)

specialties.note: Practice areas confirmed from both firm website and MC profile

industries.note: Emphasis on highly regulated industries and public sector

career_path.note: Career progression includes uncommon 'Managing Consultant' title

hires_mba.note: Hires MBA and other advanced degree holders

travel.source: inferred from firm type and client base
travel.note: Set to moderate based on mix of government/commercial clients and project-based work

work_hours.note: MC profile notes long hours are expected, work-life balance efforts by management

compensation.ug.bonus.note: Estimated at ~$10K based on typical consulting firm bonus structures

compensation.mba.base.note: MC profile states MBA/PhD compensation roughly doubles UG level to ~$150K

compensation.mba.bonus.note: Estimated at ~$30K based on typical consulting firm structures

recruiting.process.note: Confirmed 2-round process with phone screen, case + behavioral interviews

recruiting.unique.note: Heavy emphasis on candidate-led cases, take-home assignments with 24-48 hr deadlines

recruiting.timeline.note: 2-4 week process; some programs have specific deadlines like Gateway to Guidehouse

email_format.note: Most common format is first_initial.lastname@guidehouse.com (38-72% usage)

type.note: Boutique classification—not MBB or Big 4, despite PwC heritage

byu.pipeline.note: Set to alumni_only—16 current alumni indicates presence but no evidence of active BYU recruiting

byu.tip.note: Advice based on firm's public sector/healthcare strengths

gaps.reason: No reliable data found on undergraduate signing bonuses
No reliable data found on MBA signing bonuses
Guidehouse is independent (acquired by Bain Capital Private Equity in 2023, but operates independently)

notes: Guidehouse is a young firm (founded 2018) with rapid growth through the Navigant acquisition in 2019. The firm has a unique heritage from PwC's public sector business and maintains strong focus on government and regulated industries. Pre-populated CSV data covered all required LinkedIn/BYU fields. Compensation data is less transparent than MBB firms but consistent across multiple sources. The firm appears to have moderate BYU alumni presence (16 current) but no evidence of targeted campus recruiting at BYU.
